welcome_message_body: Welcome to Veldhoven! Get ready to experience the charming atmosphere and rich culture of this beautiful city in the Netherlands. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Veldhoven has to offer.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Eindhoven Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for low-cost and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all domestic and international flights at Kempen Airport.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is dedicated for cargo flights and handling at Kempen Airport.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Zoersel Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Zoersel Airport, primarily used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Gilze-Rijen Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Gilze-Rijen Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
